name: Flick Football Super Save
description:
Become the world number 1 & play as a goalkeeper in the follow-up to the hugely successful global smash, Flick Football!

Super Save is a truly addictive soccer game with four game modes. You need quick reactions and great hand-eye coordination to save the shots. Use your finger to control the goalkeeper’s gloves and react as quickly as you can to stop the ball from hitting the back of the net.

* "The most addictive game I have ever played..."
* "Just bought. Really amazing!"
* "It is the best game I have on my iPod and I have a 36gb so I got quite a lot."

Save in style or catch the ball to earn more points with Super, Mega and Ultra saves!

There are FOUR game modes:
3 LIVES - you've got three lives to get the biggest score - starts easy, gets harder!
SUDDEN DEATH - how many can you save in a row?
BEND IT - this is a super hard level and the ball bends and curves
MULTI-BALL - 50 balls in a rapid-fire game of non-stop action - gets really hard, but it's a lot of fun!

Track your position in the global leaderboards and unlock all 21 achievements with Game Center.

Follow Flick Football Super Save for tips, feedback, updates & the latest news!
www.facebook.com/iflickfoot
www.twitter.com/flickfootball

From the mobile games studio Neon Play who bought you Paper Glider, Traffic Panic and many more. See www.neonplay.com for more great games.
